price: 38. Jeer markuu noo yimaado wuxuu ku yidhaahdaa (shaydaankaa): wayee, may dhexdeenna ahaato intay isu jiraan bariga iyo galbeedka oo kale; adigaa u xune cid lala xidhiidho.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَنَا قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكَ بُعۡدَ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقَيۡنِ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡقَرِينُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā jāanā qāla yālayta baynī wabaynaka buʿ'da al-mashriqayni fabi'sa al-qarīnu
